param.name: pszHandlerID
param.para: A pointer to a handler ID as a Unicode string.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes a method that allows a handler to display the sync schedule wizard for the handler.

remarks.para: The wizard can be invoked by CoCreating CLSID_SyncMgrScheduleWizard, which is typically done when Sync Center calls , specifying SYNCMGR_OBJECTID_ShowSchedule for the object ID.
